review: Received as gift - didn't install it right away.  By the time, I did - start-up issues. The only thing it displayed was the lovely yellow explanation point and a website.  Despite all user-based fix solutions - endless reboots - never got passed the explanation point.Finally gave up after many attempts.  Now, too late to return or replace - so no Chromecast in this household.

review: Perfect addition to any room. Works smoothly. Setup was a breeze.

review: The first disappointment came when it told me that it requires Google Chrome to be my browser! I am quite satisfied with my Mozilla Firefox browser so I don't want Google Chrome! I went all the way thru the setup process, only to find a screen telling me that it's not compatible with my operating system! (I have Vista) It requires windows 7 or higher! I don't think it said that in any of the advertisements for the product. So now I have a product that I can't use!
